name: portal

description:
Simulates the world of [#1fa5ff]Aperture Science Enrichment Center[] in Mindustry using this mindustry mod.
[accent]Some of the mechanics may be different compared to the original series due to the game's boundary.[]

Check [#4078c0]README.md[] on [#f5f5f5]GitHub[] or [#7289da]Discord[] to see updates.
